markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Divine Countermeasures](/Feats.aspx?ID=1361) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 36 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You've studied your celestial heritage with the intent of better defending yourself, and you've found that your techniques are equally powerful against [celestials](/Traits.aspx?ID=23), [fiends](/Traits.aspx?ID=70), and other divine entities. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all saving throws against [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48) effects.
name: Divine Countermeasures
